summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 62nd Street from 21st Avenue Northeast to Ravenna Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9587 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
